skills.name: Thunder Edge
skills.description: [SP: 5][CD: 25s] Unleashes a powerful forward slash with the lightning-imbued blade, dealing 700% ATK of Lightning DMG and paralyzing enemies for 3s. When equipped by Herrscher of Thunder, it also inflicts Narukami's Mark on enemies hit for 15s.

skills.name: Thunder Blitz
skills.description: Wielder deals 35.0% bonus Lightning DMG. When it's equipped by Herrscher of Thunder, casting the active restores 100 Herrscher Charge. For 2s after, enemies with Narukami's Mark take 30% ATK of Lightning DMG and Herrscher of Thunder restores 10 Herrscher Charge per 0.2s (subsequent procs extend the duration).
